### Análisis descriptivo

```{r}
europe.data <- original.data %>% 
  select(continent, location, date, new_cases, new_deaths, reproduction_rate,
         hosp_patients, icu_patients, hospital_beds_per_thousand, new_tests, positive_rate, population) %>% 
  filter(continent == 'Europe', date >= '2020-07-01', location == 'Spain')

```


```{r}
summary(europe.data)
```
